definition[0]: doing careless things without thinking or worrying about the possible bad results
example[0]: When it comes to money, Dan is completely irresponsible.
example[1]: It would be irresponsible not to turn up for work without calling.
note[1]: it is irresponsible (for somebody) to do something
example[2]: It was highly irresponsible of him to leave the children on their own in the pool.
